member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2
member.summary: The DDSURFACEDESC2 structure contains a description of a surface to be created by the driver.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwSize
member.summary: Specifies the size in bytes of this DDSURFACEDESC2 structure. This member must be initialized before the structure is used.

summary.para: Specifies a set of flags that determine what members of the DDSURFACEDESC2 structure contain valid data. This member can be one or more of the following flags:

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwHeight
member.summary: Specifies the height of surface in pixels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwWidth
member.summary: Specifies the width of the surface in pixels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN
member.summary: N/A

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.lPitch
member.summary: Specifies the number of bytes between the beginnings of two adjacent scan lines; that is, the number of bytes to add to the beginning address of one scan line to reach the beginning address of the next scan line below it. The driver's DdCreateSurface callback must return this value.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwLinearSize
member.summary: Specifies the size in bytes of a formless, late-allocated, optimized surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwBackBufferCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of back buffers associated with the surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwDepth
member.summary: The bit-depth if this is a volume texture.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwMipMapCount
member.summary: Specifies the number of mipmap levels.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwRefreshRate
member.summary: Specifies the refresh rate in hertz of the monitor (used when the display mode is described).

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwSrcVBHandle
member.summary: Specifies the source used in IDirect3DVertexBuffer7.Optimize (described in the Microsoft Direct3D SDK documentation).

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwAlphaBitDepth
member.summary: Specifies the depth of the alpha buffer in bits per pixel.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwReserved
member.summary: Reserved, and should be set to zero.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.lpSurface
member.summary: Specifies the address of the associated surface memory.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.ddckCKDestOverlay
member.summary: Specifies the color key for destination overlay use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwEmptyFaceColor
member.summary: Specifies the physical color for empty cube map faces.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.ddckCKDestBlt
member.summary: Specifies the color key for destination blit use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.ddckCKSrcOverlay
member.summary: Specifies the color key for source overlay use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.ddckCKSrcBlt
member.summary: Specifies the color key for source blit use.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.ddpfPixelFormat
member.summary: Specifies a structure that describes the pixel format of the surface.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.DUMMYUNIONNAMEN.dwFVF
member.summary: Specifies the Flexible Vertex Format (D3DFVF) for the vertex buffers.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.ddsCaps
member.summary: Specifies a structure that contains the DirectDraw surface capabilities.

member.name: LPDDSURFACEDESC2.dwTextureStage
member.summary: Specifies the stage in the multitexture cascade. For more information, see Texture Stages.
